alert.note: Alert for Evangeline; Lafayette; Northern Acadia; Northern Jefferson Davis; Southern Acadia; Southern Jefferson Davis; St. Landry; Upper St. Martin (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 15 at 9:55PM CST until January 16 at 11:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM CST TUESDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST TUESDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM TUESDAY TO 6 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the first Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills as low as 8 above. For the Winter Weather Advisory, freezing rain. Additional ice accumulations of a light glaze. For the second Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 10 above zero. * WHERE...Portions of central, south central and southwest Louisiana. * WHEN...For the first Wind Chill Advisory, until 11 AM CST Tuesday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 AM CST Tuesday. For the second Wind Chill Advisory, from 8 PM Tuesday to 6 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. Call 511 for road information.

area.areaDesc: Evangeline; Lafayette; Northern Acadia; Northern Jefferson Davis; Southern Acadia; Southern Jefferson Davis; St. Landry; Upper St. Martin
